entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of freezing drizzle. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
